snippet: A couple’s proposal to demolish their 1925 house has abruptly set in motion a campaign by preservationists to better protect the city’s historic homes.
abstract: Proposal to demolish 1925 Miami Beach house has set in motion campaign by preservationists to better protect the city's historic Art Deco homes; shift has alarmed wealthy property owners and stepped up pressure on reluctant local officials.
lead_paragraph: A couple’s proposal to demolish their 1925 house has abruptly set in motion a campaign by preservationists to better protect the city’s historic homes.

headline.seo: Miami Beach Preservationists Push to Protect Home
headline.main: A Fight Over Historic Preservation Brews in Art Deco Country
headline.print_headline: A Fight Over Historic Preservation Brews in Art Deco Country
